casebody.data:
Platen, in re. At the September term, 1880, an application was made for a mandamus nisi calling upon the judge of the Eastern circuit to show cause why he should not certify a bill of exceptions, and the same was refused. At the February term, 1883, the movant made an application to this court in the general form of a bill of review to have the judgment then rendered reviewed: May 1, 1883.

Held, that the application must be denied.
